thread.title: Sudeep croons for Shweta Basu Prasad
thread.title_full: Sudeep croons for Shweta Basu Prasad - The Times of India

author: Sunayana Suresh
title: Sudeep croons for Shweta Basu Prasad
text: Devravne Budu Guru, which is being directed by Pratham and features Akul Balaji in the lead, marks the Sandalwood debut of National Award-winning actress Shweta Basu Prasad. The actress has already shot for some portions of the film, we hear. A song that will feature her in the film is now going to be sung by Kannada star Sudeep. We hear that it was composer Rajesh Ramanath who convinced his friend Sudeep to lend his voice for this number.
